Reviews.Title: Buy it for size , buy it for looks
Reviews.Author: Buyer "just another customer"
Reviews.Content: If you use the phone for  lot of emails and messagesgo get a fat phone from your provder or some other expensive bulky gadget.But if you are an occational smart feature user and like the small form factor buy this one.Buy this one knowing that it is small in size, has a small battery and little slower than other expensive phones .After buying don't complain about usability or size or life of battery.If you do not use lot of smart features like email, messaging and browing etc,use the readily available power widget to turn of wifi, data,location and blutooth servicesto save battery life.Since it has smaller capacity battery it discharges fast. Also it  charges very fast.I haven't experienced any freezes so far. Touch screen is responsive. All else is fine

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini E10i Unlocked Smartphone with 5 MP Camera, Android OS, gps navigation, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth--Intern
Reviews.Author: Nordstarx
Reviews.Content: Got the phone on time, packed nicely with everything advertised, and a 2 gb sd card in side.Looks good, behaves good, for a Sony. Battery is about 4 hours non stop on wifi, 2G i don't know yet , stand by well a lot.Get it u will not even know u got a phone in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working
Reviews.Author: B.B
Reviews.Content: It Stopped working after few months. I did not even bother to return it. There are much better phones out there than this one.

Reviews.Title: Super Tiny
Reviews.Author: L.S. "LS"
Reviews.Content: As soon as I took it out of the box I needed to return it cause I never thought it'd be that small.. I mean it could probably even get lost in my pocket, let alone inside my purse..

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: its still working great i upgraded to a new phone and gave it to my daughter and she loves it

Reviews.Title: Work perfect...I love it...
Reviews.Author: Nelson A.
Reviews.Content: Very small cell phone, and it works perfect, no complaints...all ok..I will strong recomend this cellular, It does not matter that is small cell, it is very good

Reviews.Title: Cute but Powerful
Reviews.Author: Obialeke
Reviews.Content: I wont call this a phone, its a simply an amazing machine. very quite and has the power of all big phones. the only drawback of this phone is the battery requires charging everyday.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: lyli "northwood"
Reviews.Content: Pros:The phone looks cute and feels solid. It comes with Android 2.1 (btw I bought from wireless everything and it came with 2gb memory card, 2 covers with silver and peal color, and one soft cover protector). The touch screen is responsive and I haven't felt lags so far. its sound quality and signal reception is pretty good. I was somehow concerned with its battery life after reading some comments from other reviewers. However, the phone still holds 66% level of battery life right now after I received it and had it fully charged 2 days ago. During last 2 days, I test-drove it a lot including Wi-Fi, taking pictures,  playing videos, listening music (but no data traffic enabled).  I should say that I am satisfied with its performance on battery life.Cons:(1)The specs of Xperia X10 mini indicate that it has a 5MP camera. But the size of pictures taken is below 1M (2592x1944 pixel). Although quality of pictures looks OK however I did expect more on this. If someone knows any tricks to take higher quality pictures from the phone, please let me know. (2) The manual/user-guide is not in English but other language which I don't know (probably Russia). But it's easy to download its English version online.Overall I am happy with the phone.

Reviews.Title: the fone is a little princess
Reviews.Author: yves
Reviews.Content: wow! this fone is a little beauty. When i bought it i was sceptic about his function and i wanted to offer the cell to my brother in africa as a gift. couple days later he called me n told me how happy he was and he enjoy the item. communication is perfect and evrthg is working fine.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE1
Reviews.Author: Jesus
Reviews.Content: Good quality cell phone and came quickly to me. Thanks for care provided during the purchase! I recommend it. Jesus Vazquez says goodbye!

Reviews.Title: Worked for only 3 weeks!
Reviews.Author: Lana Khrustalova
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 3 weeks now and it is already acting up. It freezes and restarts on its own. Right now, I can't even get past the opening screen.

Reviews.Title: Love this cell!
Reviews.Author: Yitzy
Reviews.Content: It's a great purchase. Easy to use and to update to Android 2.1. Absolutely going to experience Xperia Play for my kid on Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: googler
Reviews.Content: Is awesome unlocked and great if you are looking for a cellphone that is cool easy and interesting this is it

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Master_Mix
Reviews.Content: OK

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Enyelberth
Reviews.Content: Very good fabric, original, I loved it. The recomiento 100% . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Edzaida Salcedo
Reviews.Content: Excelente.. me encanta!! muy útil.. justo lo que necesitaba :D lo recomendaré a mis amigos para que lo compren. .

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini E10i Unlocked Smartphone with 5 MP...
Reviews.Author: Rossana De Vargas
Reviews.Content: I bought it because I liked the shape, small, and feature-rich smartphone, I like phones sony ericsson, It's that I like; Yes, I recommend; It's perfect for mi becauses i want it.

Reviews.Title: low internal memory
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Pinto Paiva
Reviews.Content: I like the dimensions of this cell, but the very low capacity of his sistem make I dislike it. Canot install apps, or games or anything else cause it don't have enough space to store this things, so I need to use it on basics functions and apps....

Reviews.Title: Try to avoid this mobile.
Reviews.Author: Fairman
Reviews.Content: Guys avoid this mobile. It is really not that good mobile. Many bad things plus the camera is blurry. I gave one star because there is no less than 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: J!R4!y4
Reviews.Content: the cellphone is great it functions perfect i dont have anything to claim about it..!!! the only problem is that the baterry discharges fast..!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Pablo Jaramillo
Reviews.Content: The Sony Xperia X10 mini is a great phone. Could be a small phone but the features such as OS, Camera made of this phone, a good choice if you want more technology in smaller size, i recommend it

Reviews.Title: easy to use but a bit tricky
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: excellent phone, it is easy to use, fast, the menu is well laid out but it seems a bit fragile. I do not regret buying it

Reviews.Title: it stoped working
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: for no reason my cellphone stopped working after 2 months of use, since the beginning it has been really annoying, I regret buying this little piece of garbage, it's too small, too slow, the charger sucks and now it doesn't even works.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Cellphone!
Reviews.Author: Jomar
Reviews.Content: AWESOME. Everything was fine! Thanks a lot! for my Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini E10i Unlocked Smartphone with 5 MP Camera, Android OS, gps navigation, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth--International Version with Warranty (Silver)

Reviews.Title: I don't recomand
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: The product looks fine and is new. The quality of the phone is below any expectation.The signal is bad and sometimes lacks.Skype is not working on this model, together with many other programs.I don't recommend this product. I believe this is an experimental model and the company didn't do at all a good job.

Reviews.Title: I DON'T SPEAK CHINESE
Reviews.Author: emurill
Reviews.Content: The phone is perfect, everything to expect of a SonyEricsson... the problem was being able to use it!! It comes out of the box in Chinese, so you better speak Chinese, or know someone who does. I had to go through many online videos of people setting up their phones and try to follow their steps to be able switch mine to English, wasn't easy!

Reviews.Title: Cool Little Phone.
Reviews.Author: AC
Reviews.Content: The phone is pretty cool, does everything more expensive phones do. I bought it as a gift for someone so i didn't get a lot of personal experience with it, but i played with it before gifting it and the person who received it is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini E10i Unlocked Smartphone with 5 MP Camera, Android OS, gps navigation, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth--Intern
Reviews.Author: wendy
Reviews.Content: hermoso, pequeño, ligero un muy buen telefono a mi en lo personal me encanta Sony Ericsson rapido en iternet sencillamente bueno

Reviews.Title: smaller than expected
Reviews.Author: Kishore
Reviews.Content: I was surprised to see that phone size is really small compared to the picture so I returned it and got full refund.

Reviews.Title: the phone
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with the product they sent me, the phone will not turn it began to load and I want to do anything to turn on the claim that I hope to work together to return the phone and fix it for me please.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850/900/1800/1900, HSDPA 900/2100
Screen: 2.55 inches, 240 x 320 pixels, TFT capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors, Scratch-resistant surface, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, Timescape UI
Camera: 5 MP, 2560?1920 pixels, autofocus, LED flash. Video: VGA@30fps, video light
Platform: Android OS 1.6. CPU: Qualcomm MSM7227 600MHz. Internal Memory: 128MB. External Memory: microSD, up to 16GB
MP4/H.263/H.264/WMV player, MP3/eAAC+/WMA/WAV player, YouTube, Calendar, Google Talk, Document viewer, TrackID music recognition, GPS with A-GPS support, Stereo FM radio with RDS, MMS, Email, Push email
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini E10i Unlocked Smartphone with 5 MP Camera, Android OS, gps navigation, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth--International Version with Warranty (Silver)
